technologies: React JS, Node JS, Express JS, Firebase, Tailwind CSS, React Hook, MongoDB.

features.first: Three roles can participate. Admin, Buyer & Seller.

features.second: Admin can see all buyers, and sellers can handle them.

features.third: Buyers can buy and see orders, and sellers can upload and see products.

technologies: React JS, Node JS, Express JS, React Router Dom, Firebase, Bootstrap, React Icons.

features.first: Users can choose any of the given courses

features.second: Users can download the course's pdf.

features.third: Private routes and redirects as well.

technologies: React JS, Node JS, Express JS, React Router Dom, Firebase, Tailwind CSS, MongoDB.

features.second: Users can give reviews and ratings.

features.third: Admin can update all the categories and services.
